actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services..

official_title: A bill to prohibit the military departments from placing on discharge certificates any codes or other indicators which disclose any reason why members of the Armed Forces are discharged or separated from service, and for other purposes

summary.text: Prohibits the military departments from placing on discharge certificates any codes or other indicators which disclose any reason why members of the Armed Forces are discharged or separated from service.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the military departments from placing on discharge certificates any codes or other indicators which disclose any reason why members of the Armed Forces are discharged or separated from service, and for other purposes
